X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list Reply-To: Vahid Chaychi List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 Mar 2007 01:28:13.0059 (UTC) FILETIME=[3445F530:01C761EA] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hi, The below website hosted/registered through your company is a spam website and makes its content through stealing other websites content: http://www.thebestplace4.info/ For example at http://www.thebestplace4.info/advertise-affiliate-program/, there are some paragraphs stolen from my article at http://www.weboma.com/should-you-have-a-website-to-run-a-online-business /. Please stop this website or ask them to remove our content. I will wait for three days and then will go to the next step which is consulting a lawyer and acting against the website owner or your company. Thanks for your understanding. Regards, Vahid MIME element (text/html)
Hi,
 
The below website hosted/registered through your company is a spam website and makes its content through stealing other websites content:
http://www.thebestplace4.info/
 
For example at http:/ /www.thebestplace4.info/advertise-affiliate-program/, there are some paragraphs stolen from my article at http://www.weboma.com/should-you-have-a-website-to-run-a-online -business/.
 
Please stop this website or ask them to remove our content. I will wait for three days and then will go to the next step which is consulting a lawyer and acting against the website owner or your company.
 
Thanks for your understanding.
 
Regards,
Vahid
